alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 9:46AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Kachina Village, Munds Park, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Shonto and Williams. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 5 PM Today: Doney Park 1 to 3 inches Flagstaff 3 to 5 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 8 inches Heber-Overgaard 2 to 4 inches Kachina Village 3 to 5 inches Munds Park 4 to 6 inches Payson 4 to 6 inches Pine-Strawberry 4 to 6 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Williams 3 to 5 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim
